title: Concentrated Liquidity with Cetus
description: Discover Cetus, a leading concentrated liquidity DEX on Aptos that enhances capital efficiency for liquidity providers through customizable price ranges and innovative trading features.

tasks.title: Prepare for DEX Activities
tasks.description: Add at least 0.1 APT to your wallet to explore Cetus' trading features

tasks.title: Understanding Concentrated Liquidity
tasks.description: Learn the key concept behind Cetus DEX
tasks.question: What is concentrated liquidity in the context of Cetus DEX?
options: Liquidity concentrated in a single token
Liquidity provided within specific price ranges rather than across the entire curve
Liquidity from only verified providers
Liquidity exclusively for stable assets
tasks.correctAnswer: Liquidity provided within specific price ranges rather than across the entire curve

tasks.title: Capital Efficiency
tasks.question: How does Cetus improve capital efficiency compared to traditional AMMs?
options: By eliminating trading fees entirely
By allowing LPs to concentrate their capital in active price ranges
By restricting trading to certain hours
By requiring higher minimum deposits
tasks.correctAnswer: By allowing LPs to concentrate their capital in active price ranges

tasks.title: Price Ranges
tasks.description: Learn about the LP experience on Cetus
tasks.question: What happens to liquidity provided on Cetus when the market price moves outside the selected range?
options: Liquidity is automatically adjusted to cover the new range
Liquidity becomes inactive and stops earning fees until price returns to range
Liquidity is automatically converted to the dominant token
Liquidity is returned to the provider immediately
tasks.correctAnswer: Liquidity becomes inactive and stops earning fees until price returns to range

tasks.title: Trading Options
tasks.question: What trading features does Cetus typically offer?
options: Only market orders
Only limit orders
Spot trading, limit orders, and swap routing
Only cross-chain swaps
tasks.correctAnswer: Spot trading, limit orders, and swap routing

tasks.title: Token Pairs
tasks.question: What types of token pairs can typically be traded on Cetus?
options: Only APT to stablecoin pairs
Only stable pairs
Wide range of pairs including APT pairs, stablecoin pairs, and other token pairs
Only pre-approved tokens by governance
tasks.correctAnswer: Wide range of pairs including APT pairs, stablecoin pairs, and other token pairs

tasks.title: Fee Tiers
tasks.description: Learn about trading economics on Cetus
tasks.question: How are fee tiers typically structured on Cetus?
options: Fixed fee of 0.3% for all pairs
Different fee tiers (e.g., 0.01%, 0.05%, 0.3%) for different volatility expectations
No fees for trading, only for withdrawing
Subscription-based model only
tasks.correctAnswer: Different fee tiers (e.g., 0.01%, 0.05%, 0.3%) for different volatility expectations

tasks.title: Limit Orders
tasks.question: How do limit orders work on Cetus?
options: They don't exist on Cetus
They allow users to set a specific price at which they want to buy or sell
They are only available for stable pairs
They require special permissions to use
tasks.correctAnswer: They allow users to set a specific price at which they want to buy or sell

tasks.title: LP Positions
tasks.description: Learn about liquidity provision on Cetus
tasks.question: What is a unique feature of LP positions on Cetus?
options: They can only be created with APT
They are represented as NFTs that can be transferred
They have a mandatory 7-day lock period
They can only be created by verified users
tasks.correctAnswer: They are represented as NFTs that can be transferred

tasks.title: Impermanent Loss
tasks.question: How does concentrated liquidity affect impermanent loss compared to traditional AMMs?
options: It eliminates impermanent loss entirely
It can increase impermanent loss due to more extreme asset ratio changes within ranges
It has no effect on impermanent loss
It only applies impermanent loss to one side of the pair
tasks.correctAnswer: It can increase impermanent loss due to more extreme asset ratio changes within ranges

tasks.title: Integration Ecosystem
tasks.description: Learn about Cetus in the broader Aptos ecosystem
tasks.question: How does Cetus typically integrate with other Aptos protocols?
options: It operates completely independently with no integrations
Through yield aggregators, other DeFi protocols, and wallet partners
Only through official Aptos partnerships
Only through CEX integrations
tasks.correctAnswer: Through yield aggregators, other DeFi protocols, and wallet partners
